meanings.definition: Capable of serving a purpose or function.
meanings.sent1: The old bike may not be fancy, but it is serviceable for getting around town.
meanings.sent2: A hammer is a serviceable tool for driving nails into wood.
meanings.sent3: The serviceable umbrella kept me dry during the sudden rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: Her serviceable advice helped me navigate through the difficult situation.
meanings.sent5: The serviceable flashlight illuminated the dark path ahead.

meanings.definition: In good enough condition to be used.
meanings.sent1: The serviceable chair may have a few scratches, but it is still comfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent2: Despite its age, the serviceable car runs smoothly without any major issues.
meanings.sent3: He proudly showed off his serviceable collection of vintage toys.
meanings.sent4: The serviceable laptop may not be the latest model, but it gets the job done.
meanings.sent5: The serviceable jacket kept me warm during the chilly evening.

meanings.sent1: The serviceable pen wrote smoothly without any ink smudges.
meanings.sent2: The serviceable phone had a full battery and was ready for the important call.
meanings.sent3: She found a serviceable recipe online to bake cookies for the party.
meanings.sent4: The serviceable key unlocked the door without any difficulty.
meanings.sent5: The serviceable backpack had enough space for all my school supplies.
